Title: Create Assignments
Description: Get started by crafting your own study assignments. Define tasks, set deadlines, and specify the level of difficulty. You're in control.

Title: Collaborate with Friends
Description: Invite your study buddies to join your group. Share assignments, resources, and dive into productive study sessions. Learning is more fun when it's shared.

Title: Learn, Collaborate, Succeed
Description: Immerse yourself in your study assignments. Collaborate with friends to tackle challenges, ask questions, and share knowledge. Academic success becomes a shared accomplishment.

Title: Track Your Progress
Description: Stay on top of your academic progress with insightful analytics. Monitor assignment completion, study hours, and performance metrics to fine-tune your learning journey.

Title: Join the Community
Description: Connect with a thriving community of students and educators. Gain valuable insights, seek assistance, and explore study groups to align with your interests.
